ranks.text: This cooperation kicks off on 5/6 automatically as part of the main story. Unlocks Mishima's Support, a very useful side ability that allows back-up party members to still earn a little EXP, albeit at a reduced rate.
Automatically triggered as a story progression moment on 5/8. Impactful Conversation Choices for this Rank:None! Take it easy.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Mishima's Enthusiasm, increasing the EXP earned from battles.
choices: Choice 2: "We're part of... the Phandom?" +2 / "Let's tell the truth." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks Mishima's Desperation, which boosts the EXP back-up party members recieve from Mishima's Support.
Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "Is it for me?" +3 / "Why was it so expensive?" +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Unlocks the Inokashira Park location
choices: Choice 1: "Just tell me already." +2 / "You sure are fired up..." +2
Choice 2: "Rumors are wrong all the time..." +2 / "It's none of our business." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:Once this is done, meet with your team and then go into mementos and find the target. Talk to them. Later, Mishima will get in touch to talk:Unlocks Phanboy, drastically increasing the EXP you gain from battle.
choices: Choice 1: "You're so reliable." +3 / "And what exactly will we win?" +2
Choice 2: "Sounds pretty twisted." +2 / "You need to chill." +2
Choice 3: "Maybe the Phansite?" +3 / "I'm sure there is." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "I'm not leaving." +3 / "You should run too." +2
Choice 3: "Wait, that was all an act?" +3 / "You were super cool." +3 / "Totally." +2

ranks.text: Impactful conversation choices for this rank:
choices: Choice 1: "You showed some real courage." +3 / "I'm glad you're still alive." +2

ranks.text: Any choices you make will be irrelevant, since this is the max rank. Unlocks Salvation Wish, allowing back-up party members to gain full EXP from battles.

name: Mishima
location: Shinjuku or Shibuya, generally at night
